Container.Name: SteamDBFreeGamesClaimer
Container.Overview:
It scrapes SteamDB for free games and uses the IPC API from ASF to redeem the free games automatically
Don't forget to install the config file and rename to config.json5 https://github.com/lupohan44/SteamDBFreeGamesClaimer/blob/main/config.example.json5
Things to be aware of: It is probably against some kind of TOS https://github.com/azhuge233/SteamDB-FreeGames-dotnet/blob/master/Things%20should%20be%20aware%20of.md
Container.Description:
It scrapes SteamDB for free games and uses the IPC API from ASF to redeem the free games automatically
Don't forget to install the config file and rename to config.json5 https://github.com/lupohan44/SteamDBFreeGamesClaimer/blob/main/config.example.json5

Container.Requires: ASF installed with IPC acces A valid config file(read the description)
